text: studio clutter = organized chaos = feels like home nowadays 🎨
street art et cafes spice up 'home' vibes ici!
home's less location now, more like wherever i can splash paint & create some chaos amidst order ✨

find myself agreeing - home isn't just one place these days. got fam back where i grew up but bits of me have taken root in every studio i've splattered paint in 🎨 sometimes it’s those silent moments under familiar skies that smack you right in the feels & say 'yeah, this is home too'.
adult life’s like painting abstracts unknowingly...anvas toujours surprise!
times are changing; pressure's still there, just more subtle now
even art's not free from bias – talent gets sidelined too
brushes don’t care if you’re homme or femme - art’s legit equalizing game out here... gotta sway through those silly stigmas like dancing between paint strokes.
cafes here? chill enough sans date - lotsa artsy joints welcome bohemian vibes only
city's def got a duo vibe goin’ strong 😅 solo’s cool too tho; northeastt sipping mint tea at quiet corners beats speed dating anyday! juste un peu de paix 🍵✨
